title: Introducing: Little Hollow
content:
With a mere one hundred and seventy nine seconds of music to the projects name, you may be asking why North Carolina based bedroom producer Little Hollow deserves an ‘Introducing’ article at such an early point in his career.

Granted, it’s very little to cast judgement upon, but the two tracks in question; Customer Service and Get Out are mightily exciting. Having dipped a toe in the water under his premiere moniker (and real name) Logan Pate, Little Hollow appears to be a more considered musical affair.

Slick, soulful vocals and a Youth Lagoon-esque level of emotional integrity make up the majority of the two tracks, leaving the listener unsure as to the musical direction of Little Hollow. Where previous work has seen Pate construct delicate acoustic numbers that often spill over the five minute mark, it’s clear he’s aiming for a more refined aesthetic with this new project. Check out both tracks below and keep up with Little Hollow via his Facebook page.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
